metadata.title: USN-3280-1 -- Apache Batik vulnerability
metadata.description: Lars Krapf and Pierre Ernst discovered that Apache Batik incorrectly handled XML external entities. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to obtain sensitive files from the filesystem, or cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3280-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libbatik-java - 1.7.ubuntu-8ubuntu2.14.04.2 No subscription required
